HANDLERS.description: Prefix of commands. Can be also false

READ_MESSAGES.description: Bot will read all messages. Can be also false

PM_ANTISPAM.description: Enable or disable private message anti-spam (true or false)

READ_COMMAND.description: Bot will read all commands (blue tick). Can be also false

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: For updating bot and setting vars remotely

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Exact name which you gave at the top

STICKER_DATA.description: Name of stickers created using bot. Can also split using ;

BOT_INFO.description: Name, image, owner and other details in menu (separate with commas)

SUDO.description: These numbers can control your bot. Separate with commas

ALIVE.description: Alive message {image/link}, {sender} can also be used
ALIVE.value:
👋 Hello {sender}!

🚀 *I'm up and running smoothly!*
⏳ *Uptime:* {uptime}
🧠 *Feeling smart and ready to assist you!*
📜 Type *.list or .menu* to see more of what I can do!
https://i.imgur.com/P7ziVhr.jpeg

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep bot always online (true or false)
